content: {"name": "Covenant Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The Food Pantry is closed in the month of November.\nDuring Level 2 and Level 3 snow emergencies, the Food Pantry will be canceled.  It will not be rescheduled.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "13360 New Delaware Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Mount Vernon", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43050", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.3892127, "longitude": -82.5090278}, "phones": [{"number": "(740) 392-3152", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
